meaningMnemonic: Sometimes <radical>life</radical> gives you a <radical>kick</radical>, and you have to <kanji>express</kanji> yourself to deal with it! How do you express yourself? On the <kanji>surface</kanji> (of your face)!
readingMnemonic: You need to <kanji>express</kanji> yourself, so you call up a friend and say "<reading>Heyo</reading>!" (ひょう).
